level.heading: Scope.
level.text: This chapter applies to disclaimers of any interest in or power over property, whenever created.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 16-205
level.text: For Law 16-205, see notes following ยง 19-1501.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based upon ยง 3 of the Uniform Disclaimer of Property Interests Act (1999).
